description:
Our clean and spacious 2 bedroom apartment is a short walk to Rockaway Beach Surf Club, Tacoway Beach, Playland Motel and Ripper's. We have 2 bedrooms with a double bed in each, and huge couch that can comfortably be used as a single bed for a 5th person (extra charge).
The best part of all, it's just a block away to the beach, with the surf break at 90th st. Bonus: we've got a nice longboard you can borrow during your stay. Double bonus: the kitchen opens up to a big backyard garden.
name: Rockaway Beach Surf and Garden Apartment
review: Great & cozy place to stay, so close to the wonderful beach & everything. Refreshing surfer's vibe. + Owners are really kind :)
